entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 02 February 2023
